comments: Shared transliteration tests for dravidian scripts. In each test, the dev field is compulsory.

tests.dev: असय औषधिः ग्रन्थः। ऎ ऒ यॆक्ककॊ?
tests.telugu: అసయ ఔషధిః గ్రన్థః। ఎ ఒ యెక్కకొ?
tests.kannada: ಅಸಯ ಔಷಧಿಃ ಗ್ರನ್ಥಃ। ಎ ಒ ಯೆಕ್ಕಕೊ?
tests.tamil_failing: அஸய ஔஷதிஃ க்ரந்தஃ। எ ஒ யெக்ககொ?
tests.optitrans: asaya OShadhiH granthaH| e o yekkako?
tests.hk: asaya OShadhiH granthaH| e o yekkako?
